sentences.en: Arrange for the transfer of medical records to your new doctor.
sentences.cn: 安排一下把病历转给你的新医生的事宜。

sentences.en: Encouraging teacher transfer would not, by itself, integrate the teaching corps.
sentences.cn: 鼓励教师调动本身不会消弭教学队伍中的种族隔离。

sentences.en: Football clubs have been busy in the close season transfer market.
sentences.cn: 足球俱乐部在休赛季节的转会市场上一直忙个不停。

sentences.en: Getting there often means a couple of transfers on a bus line.
sentences.cn: 去那里经常得倒两三趟公共汽车。

sentences.en: He has been kicking against this transfer for weeks.
sentences.cn: 几周以来他一直反对这次调动.

sentences.en: He was transferred for a fee of £8 million.
sentences.cn: 他以800万英镑的转会费转到了其他球队。

sentences.en: Her boss recommended a permanent transfer overseas.
sentences.cn: 她的老板建议调她常驻海外.

sentences.en: I intend to transfer the property to my son.
sentences.cn: 我想把这笔财产转给我儿子.

sentences.en: Ideas that work well in one school often don’t transfer well to another.
sentences.cn: 在一所学校行得通的理念套用在另一所学校上往往行不通。

sentences.en: Oxford United have transfer-listed two midfield players.
sentences.cn: 牛津联足球俱乐部已把两名中场球员列入转会名单。

sentences.en: Penny’s applied for a transfer to head office.
sentences.cn: 彭妮已申请调到总部去。

sentences.en: Remove the wafers with a spoon and transfer them to a plate.
sentences.cn: 用勺子抄起薄饼，把它们转盛到盘子里。

sentences.en: Swod transferred from MI6 to the Security Service.
sentences.cn: 斯沃德从军情六处调到了安全局。

sentences.en: The person can transfer from wheelchair to seat with relative ease.
sentences.cn: 那个人可以比较轻松地从轮椅上移到座位上。

sentences.en: The presence or absence of clouds can have an important impact on heat transfer.
sentences.cn: 有无云层对热量的传递会产生重要的影响。

sentences.en: They can transfer or share the contract with whosoever they choose.
sentences.cn: 他们可以与他们选择的任何人交换或分享这份合约。

sentences.en: This worker wants a transfer to another post.
sentences.cn: 这个工人要求调换工种.

sentences.en: Trace around your template and transfer the design onto a sheet of card.
sentences.cn: 沿着你的样板边画一圈，把图案描在一张硬纸板上。

sentences.en: Transfer this sauce to a separate saucepan, if desired.
sentences.cn: 如果愿意的话，可以把这些调味汁倒入一只单独的长柄锅里。

sentences.en: You will need to arrange a telegraphic transfer from your bank to ours.
sentences.cn: 你们得安排由你方银行将钱款电汇给我方银行。

sentences.en: You’ll be transferred to the Birmingham office.
sentences.cn: 在你将被调到伯明翰办事处。

words.tran_cn: 可转让的；[数] 可转移的
可转移的；可传递的；可转换的
受让人；承让人；被调任者
[生化] 转铁蛋白；铁传递蛋白
转让；[计]使转移；传递；调任

phrases.tran_cn: 文件传输；经由网路将档案由一电脑复制至另一台电脑
质量传递，传质；质量转移
转换效率；传输效率；合金过渡系数
传输系统；传递系统；传送系统

trans.tran_cn: 转移，调动，换乘，（运动员）转会
trans.tran_en: the act of changing from one bus, aircraft etc to another while travelling
to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization
if a skill, idea, or quality transfers from one situation to another, or if you transfer it, it can be used in the new situation
to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

trans.tran_cn: 转让，转学，转乘，转会（尤指职业足球队）
trans.tran_en: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization

trans.tran_cn: 使转移，使调动，转让（权利等），让与
trans.tran_en: to move from one place, school, job etc to another, or to make someone do this, especially within the same organization
